CANCELED - Static variable in interface javax.jaxtx.compensation.Status
The transaction/participant has canceled successfully.
CANCELING - Static variable in interface javax.jaxtx.compensation.Status
The transaction/participant is in the process of canceling.
COMPENSATED - Static variable in interface javax.jaxtx.compensation.Status
The transaction/participant has compensated successfully for work performed.
COMPENSATING - Static variable in interface javax.jaxtx.compensation.Status
The transaction/participant is in the process of compensating for work performed.
COMPENSATION_FAILED - Static variable in interface javax.jaxtx.compensation.Status
The transaction/participant was asked to compensate, but compensation failed.
COMPLETED - Static variable in interface javax.jaxtx.compensation.Status
The transaction/participant has completed successfully.
COMPLETING - Static variable in interface javax.jaxtx.compensation.Status
The transaction/participant is in the process of completing.
COMPLETION_FAILED - Static variable in interface javax.jaxtx.compensation.Status
The transaction/participant was asked to complete, but this was not possible.
CompensationParticipant - interface javax.jaxtx.compensation.CompensationParticipant.
This is the interface that participants within a compensation transaction must support.
CompensationParticipantManager - interface javax.jaxtx.compensation.CompensationParticipantManager.
When a Compensation Transaction participant registers with a transaction it may get a reference to a service that lets it callback into the transaction and drive any state-transitions for itself.
CompensationTransaction - interface javax.jaxtx.compensation.CompensationTransaction.
This is the interface that the transaction service implementation exposes in order to allow compensation participants to be enrolled.
CompensationTransactionCancelledException - exception javax.jaxtx.compensation.CompensationTransactionCancelledException.

This is the interface that container uses to demarcate transactions.

compensate() - Method in interface javax.jaxtx.compensation.CompensationParticipant

complete() - Method in interface javax.jaxtx.compensation.CompensationParticipant
The compensation transaction has terminated successfully and no further work is required by the participants.

equals(Object) - Method in interface javax.jaxtx.compensation.CompensationTransaction
It is often necessary to be able to compare transactions, e.g., in some protocol implementations, participants may only be registered once with a transaction and this operation can be used to determine whether or not a container has already seen this specific transaction.
exited() - Method in interface javax.jaxtx.compensation.CompensationParticipantManager

U

UNDO_ONLY - Static variable in interface javax.jaxtx.compensation.Status
